api_list.api_description: Shortens a given URL using the is.gd service.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The URL you want to shorten.

api_list.api_description: Estimates the nationality of a person based on the name.

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: The name or list of names to predict the nationality for.

query: I have a website URL that I want to shorten for sharing purposes. Also, I want to predict the nationality of the name 'Carlos'. Can you help me with both?
